sentence.Network_en: Maternal love lies in the everyday of nursing.
sentence.Network_cn: 母爱是从一天天的喂奶中来的.

sentence.Network_en: My heart goes out in sympathy and love the bleeding heart of her dear and father.
sentence.Network_cn: 对她的亲爱父母亲的淌着血的心,我衷心表示同情和热爱.

sentence.Network_en: Prone to drowning pet love, love lies in reciprocity, love much less stringent.
sentence.Network_cn: 母爱容易出现溺宠, 友爱重在礼尚往来, 情爱少了几多严谨.
